title: Agent Profile
description: Defines an agent's identity, personality, and configuration for claude-in-factorio

name.description: Agent identifier. Used as FACTORIO_AGENT_ID, session key, and telemetry tag.

system_prompt.description: Full system prompt sent to Claude. Defines the agent's personality and behavior.

model.description: Claude model override (e.g. sonnet, opus, haiku). CLI --model flag takes precedence.

max_turns.description: Max tool-use turns per message. CLI --max-turns flag takes precedence.

telemetry_name.description: Display name in telemetry events. Defaults to name if not set.

planet.description: Factorio surface name to spawn the character on (e.g. nauvis, vulcanus). Defaults to nauvis.

group.description: Group name for multi-agent mode. Use --group to launch all agents with the same group.

response_format.description: Response format config. Defines section labels and colors for structured responses. Auto-generates formatting instructions appended to the system prompt.

description.description: What this section is for (used in prompt generation)
